title: Exhibitionist Men and the Women Who Watch Them
description: Tales told about flashers, and by flashers in public. Includes public sex, nudity, nude beaches, and places like subway trains and busses. Truly, any place where a person can safely show themselves and be gone, that is what being an exhibitionist is all about. All persons contained in the vignettes containe in the book were at least eighteen years of age at the time of the depiction.
author: Thomas Wainwright
